body: You place a curse upon a creature, causing it to avoid the sight of a specific trigger, which is a kind of creature, object, or condition designated by you. When the target is within 30 feet of a trigger and is aware of the trigger, it gains the sickened condition and feels an urge to leave. A successful Will save negates the urge to leave, but the sickened condition persists as long as the target is within 30 feet of a trigger and aware of it. Example triggers include beggars, filthy clothing, diseased creatures, the king, blood, spiders, rats, corpses, and sewage.
description: Target is sickened while viewing trigger.
level_text: Bard: 3; Skald: 3; Sorcerer: 5; Wizard: 5; Arcanist: 5; Witch: 5
name: Curse Of Disgust
